name: BlockchainMoneyEngine

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: @dev called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation:
Constructor function
   * Initializes contract with initial supply tokens to the creator of the contract
attributes.name: BlockchainMoneyEngine

attributes.documentation: Internal transfer, only can be called by this contract
attributes.name: _transfer

attributes.documentation:
Transfer tokens
   * Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account
   * @param _to The address of the recipient
@param _value the amount to send
attributes.name: transfer
transferFrom

attributes.documentation:
Set allowance for other address
   * Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf
   * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
attributes.name: approve
approveAndCall

attributes.documentation:
Destroy tokens
   * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly
   * @param _value the amount of money to burn
attributes.name: burn

attributes.documentation:
Destroy tokens from other account
   * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.
   * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
attributes.name: burnFrom
